title: Customized Learning Strategy Design Through Digital Media Usage Type Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in digital media utilization and competency in learning tool applications
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining VR simulations and mobile surveys in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core metrics for classifying digital media usage types.
Learners can demonstrate the procedure for processing survey-collected data using cluster analysis tools.
Learners can apply the characteristics of three representative media usage types (focused, dispersed, balanced) to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
